trans-unit.source: To support users in many different languages, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s SQL parser understands all Unicode characters and allows any Unicode character or number to be used in an identifier.

seg-source.mrk: To support users in many different languages, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s SQL parser understands all Unicode characters and allows any Unicode character or number to be used in an identifier.

target.mrk: To support users in many different languages, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>'s SQL parser understands all Unicode characters and allows any Unicode character or number to be used in an identifier.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> does not attempt to ensure that the characters in identifiers are valid in the database's locale.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> does not attempt to ensure that the characters in identifiers are valid in the database's locale.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> does not attempt to ensure that the characters in identifiers are valid in the database's locale.
